name: Safe Zone (itch)
description:
Made for Ludem Dare 40 - theme: "The more you have, the worse it gets" 

A terrible  fate has befallen the city. The only option left is to flee. 

Help the survivors to escape, but as your group grows, so does your risk of capture. 

Good luck. 

Controls : Left click to select survivors, left click to tell them to move. 

Made by E Swain and J Kapella. 

A Culturebosh! game.
